data.title: Radio Stations and Song List
data.meta_description: With a total of 11 radio stations, 155 songs, and 8 different talk shows, our GTA San Andreas Radio Stations and Song list guide details the name and genre of
data.text:
With a total of 11 radio stations, 155 songs, and 8 different talk shows, our GTA San Andreas Radio Stations and Song list guide details the name and genre of every station, as well as a full list of songs that you can expect to hear in-game. This guide includes an update for the GTA: The Trilogy - Definitive Edition release for Xbox, PC, and PS5.

Looking to find out which songs are included on a particular radio station? Be sure to click the following links to jump toâ€¦

CSR 103.9 has 13 songs. It is broadcasted from San Fierro and is hosted by Phillip "PM" Michaels. The station plays Pop and Boy Band music.
